Description.Organization: Use this if segments and employees should be able to align with this objective.
Description.Segment: Use this if employees and sub-segments should be able to align with this objective.
Description.User: Use this if you want to align the objective with team or organization objectives. It can also be used to share your objectives with your manager.

Description.Organization: If the objective should be private and only accessible to people with access to the organization, use this.
Description.Segment: If the objective should be private and only accessible to people with access to the segment, use this.
Description.User: If the objective should be private and only accessible by yourself, use this.

ErrorMessages.EmptyObjectiveName: Please enter a objective name to continue
ErrorMessages.EmptyParentObjective: Please select Parent objective to continue
